title: Restaurant Management Website
description: A comprehensive management system for restaurants to handle orders, reservations, and menus.
technologies: React.js (with React Router, Axios, Context API)
challenges: Managing role-based dashboards and maintaining responsiveness across all devices.
improvements: Add inventory tracking, generate monthly reports, and support multi-language UI.

title: Roommate Finder Website
description: A platform where users can find compatible roommates based on shared preferences and location.
technologies: React.js (with React Router, Axios, Context API)
challenges: Designing an efficient user search and filtering algorithm based on preferences.
improvements: Integrate a chat system and add profile verification features.

title: JobTrack
description: A job application tracking tool that helps users organize and monitor their job search progress.
challenges: Handling user authentication and managing real-time updates across different job statuses.
improvements: Add analytics dashboard, drag-and-drop job stages, and dark mode toggle.
